settings.login_description: Login to access notification, trading, chat and much more
settings.notification_permissions_disabled: Notification permissions are disabled. Please enable them in the app settings.
settings.logout_success: You have been logged out successfully.
settings.logout_error: Failed to log out. Please try again.
settings.delete_account_warning: Deleting your account will permanently erase all your data, including chat history, points, and profile details. This action is irreversible.
settings.confirm_deletion_warning: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.
settings.user_not_found: User not found. Please log in again.
settings.delete_success: Your account and all associated data have been permanently deleted.
settings.delete_error: Failed to delete account. Please try again.
settings.session_expired_message: Please log in again to delete your account.
settings.reward_wait_time: Please wait at least 2 minutes to claim the next reward.
settings.login_to_customize_profile: Please log in to customize your profile.
settings.watch_ad: Watch an ad to earn rewards!
settings.watch_ad_message: Earn points by watching ads. These points can be used to participate in app contests and unlock special features.

home.unfair_trade_description: You're offering too much and receiving too little! Adjust your trade to get a fair exchange.
home.invalid_trade_description: You're receiving way more than you're giving. Please adjust your offer to keep the trade fair.
home.trade_description: Do you want to add a short description (optional)?
home.trade_description_hint: You can write username like @username (It can be copied)
home.screenshot_error: Failed to capture and save the screenshot. Please try again.

alert.free_trade_used: Your free trade has been posted!
alert.trade_posted_points: Trade posted successfully! 200 points deducted. Your remaining points:
alert.insufficient_points_message: You need 200 points to create a trade, but you have insufficient points. Earn or purchase more points to continue.
alert.unable_to_create_trade: Unable to create trade. Please reload the app & try again later.
alert.sign_in_required: To create a trade, you need to sign in.
alert.missing_items_error: Please add at least one item to both 'Offer' and 'Want' sections.

value.title: Value Screen
value.description: Live Blox Fruits values updated hourly. Find accurate item values here and visit the trade feed for fruits or game passes.
value.name: Name
value.no_results: No items match your search criteria.

stock.description: Disclaimer: Stock updates may sometimes be delayed as data is updated manually. We appreciate your patience and recommend checking back periodically for the latest updates.
stock.selected_fruit_notification_description: You will be notified when the selected fruit is available in stock.
stock.fetching_data: We are collecting data, wait a few minutes.
stock.activate_notifications: To activate notifications, you need to sign in.
stock.no_results: No items match your search criteria.
stock.insufficient_points_description: You need at least 50 points to select more fruits. Earn points by watching ads or participating in activities.
stock.signin_required_message: You need to sign in to activate notifications.

trade.delete_confirmation_message: Are you sure you want to delete this trade? This action cannot be undone.
trade.delete_error_message: Failed to delete the trade. Please try again.

trade.feature_confirmation_message: Are you sure you want to feature this trade? This will boost its visibility!
trade.feature_success_message: Your trade is now featured for 24 hours!
trade.feature_error_message: Failed to feature trade. Please try again.

signin.message: You need to sign in to view full trade listings and send messages.

signin.error_invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address.

signin.error_invalid_email_format: The email address is not valid.

signin.error_email_in_use: This email is already in use.
